Experience.title: Low Code and Full Stack Web Application Developer
Experience.description: Worked with a team to design, implement, test, and demonstrate functional application prototypes to increase workflow internally. Worked on multiple team projects during this time to cater to specific clientneeds and requirements. Gained experience in the software development lifecycle, PowerApps Suite, MERN, GraphQL, Gatsby.js, TypeScript, ASP.NET, prototype design and team management.
